none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 06, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
How did these people make a shredding hardcore record sound like a damaged surf/garage assault and a perfect unknown '90s Basement DIY nugget at the same time? Then again....ours is not to question why, ours is to fucking dig, right? Total freakazoid Portland sounds of the highest order, as far as I can tell these kids dropped a demo 6 years ago and ghosted, which kinda adds to the mystique. Also, "Break Borrow" is a 100% classic punk jammer.  HELLS CARGO

seo.title: Hells Cargo - Hells Cargo - Terminal Escape
